snippet: The network experienced a ratings decline in the last two months, as viewers turned away from Washington and toward disaster coverage.
abstract: MSNBC's focus on Washington politics has pushed network to fourth place in ratings, as viewers turn toward disaster coverage and breaking news; channel president Phil Griffin notes nature of news is cyclical, and that looking at overall big picture is more important than isolated periods.
lead_paragraph: The network experienced a ratings decline in the last two months, as viewers turned away from Washington and toward disaster coverage.

headline.seo: Devoted to Politics, MSNBC Slips on Breaking News
headline.main: Devoted to Politics, MSNBC Slips on Breaking News
headline.print_headline: Devoted to Politics, MSNBC Slips on Breaking News
